black.content: No, I'm not a wood elf. I'm a _ elf.

white: Using alchemist's fire to cure an STD.
Being over-encumbered by the skins of your slain foes.
Accidentally summoning a Demon Prince by speaking his name out loud.
Using a saxophone as a mount.
The insatiable urge to punt a gnome.
Rolling a 1 on an Acrobatics check in front of your crush.
Literally dropping an anvil through the ceiling.
Locking yourself in a wardrobe only to slowly suffocate.
Abusing the fine print in the Player's Handbook.
Vandalizing important government buildings with the spoils of battle.
An elaborate ritual that literally creates Opposite Day.
Trying to seduce a dwarven lass while blackout drunk.
A magical item that is too good to be true.
A bout of food poisoning from undercooked rations.
A redemption quest that leads to the ruination of mankind.
Succeeding on every constitution saving throw while trying to get wasted.
Arguing over who will take point in the middle of a flaming apocalypse.
Pickpocketing the underwear off of your target.
Rolling for stealth to avoid a walk of shame.
Citing a random sourcebook that no one has ever heard of.
Fistfighting an NPC who is twice your level.
The taste of sweet, sweet revenge.
The powerful, asphyxiating thighs of a female orc.
Taking 2 points of piercing damage by dropping your last health potion.
12 copper pieces and a rusty button.
Asking every NPC for their name and life story.
The Illusion of a rave party.
Bribing the jail warden with all the useless junk in your inventory.
A party of adventurers who always litter.
Dreamwalking into an embarrassing wet dream.
A poorly conceived bardic boy band.
Hiding caltrops in the town's fountain.
Utter deviation from the campaign's storyline.
The Augment Crystal of Explosive Diarrhea.
Every person who has ever wronged you, ever.
Using Major Image to display orcish mating rituals in the town square.
Painting the walls with the blood of my enemies.
A waterskin (which is filled with booze).
Burning down a forest to find your friend.
Entering into a dubious alliance with a genocidal lich.
A full barrel of lethally strong liquor.
Rolling a 1 on your inspiration dice.
A pack of hungry dire wolves.
Polymorphing a party member into a horse to use them as a mount.
The other-other-other horn on the tielfling.
Riding the back of a giant.
Bathing in the gold we've earned.
Breaking your weapon for the third time.
A Friends spell gone horribly, horribly wrong.
Selling out your party members for some sweet perks.
Saying "ow" every five seconds in increasing volume.
Three critical hits in a row.
Sparta kicking an enemy into a lake of lava.
Tricking a ranger into eating her animal companion.
Getting off to a bad start.
Killing a peasant with a rolling pin.
Name-dropping your important political allies during an Intimidate check.
Burning a hole in the enemy's junk with holy light.
Feeding children to see if your rations are poisoned.
Tripping on a rock and knocking myself unconscious.
A torch in your inventory that is lighting your entire backpack on fire.
A bard that tells knock-knock jokes.
Taking a shortcut and immediately getting lost.
A side quest gone so so wrong.
Taking 2.5 hours to divide the loot.
Spraying the cheering audience with your opponent's blood.
The lone human of the group.
Throwing rocks when you run out of arrows.
A preposterous amount of phase spiders.
Awakening every woodland creature you come across.
A level 1 dwarf paladin with leprosy.
Wearing only a loin cloth, as god intended.
An awkward make-out session between two party members.
Turning the Big Bad into a pet hamster.
Making a lopsided deal with a Archfey.
Dragging a fire-breathing dragon into a barn.
Walking in on the innkeeper and his wife mid-coitus.
Crying like a little bitch when you're out of spells.
Passing meaningless notes to the DM just to fuck with people.
Shooting an arrow precisely into the enemy's asshole.
A goddamn herd of gold-eating badgers.
Being so fucking wasted that you can't even.
Successfully disguising yourself as the opposite sex.
Rolling dice off of the damn table like an idiot.
A weapon with a name that sounds vaguely sexual.
Having no idea what the fuck is going on.
5 hours of teeth-grinding, heart-pounding, sweat-inducing, hot sex with landsharks.
A suicide note scrawled in shitty draconic.
Getting struck by lightning because the DM is done with your bullshit.
Beating the everliving shit out of an NPC out of frustration.
Asking the DM for a reroll when you know you are fucked.
Having the coolest fucking dice set in the group.
A warm party orgy on a cold winter's night.
Getting laid by crawling up a chicken's ass and waiting patiently.
Causing the death of your parents and then getting pissy about it.
